## createCircle() function

创建圆 Primitive 对象，此方法会根据 clampToGround 创建不同的对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createCircle(
  options: CircleOption
): Primitive | GroundPrimitive
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                     | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| options   | [CircleOption](./cesium.circleoption.md) | 圆参数      |

**Returns:**

Primitive \| GroundPrimitive
